summary: This is an FBI evidence collection log documenting the seizure of a Dell Powerridge DVR controller and a DVR system (NICE VISION PRO) from the Metropolitan Corrections Center (MCC) in New York on August 15, 2019. The seizure is part of the death investigation of Jeffrey Epstein, who was found deceased in his cell at the MCC.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document is part of the investigation into his death while in custody at the Metropolitan Corrections Center. He is listed as the subject (UNSUB) and the case is a death investigation.

events.title: Seizure of DVR Equipment from MCC
events.description: FBI Special Agents seized a Dell Powerridge 8420 DVR Controller and a DVR System #1 (NICE VISION PRO Digital Video & Audio Recorder) from the Metropolitan Corrections Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Corrections Center (MCC), 150 Park Row, New York, New York
keyFacts: On August 15, 2019, the FBI seized digital video recording (DVR) equipment from the Metropolitan Corrections Center in New York.
The seizure was part of the FBI's death investigation into Jeffrey Epstein, case number 90A-NY-3151227.
The seized equipment included a Dell Powerridge 8420 DVR Controller and a NICE VISION PRO Digital Video & Audio Recorder system with a disk array chassis containing 16 hard drives.
The document is an official FBI evidence collection log, indicating a formal investigative step following Epstein's death in custody.
